ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have Heritrix 1.14.1 and wayback 1.6 installed in a ubuntu server. Both can be run on the web browser using links as follows,

Hi all,

I have Heritrix 1.14.1 and wayback 1.6 installed in a ubuntu serve=
r. Both can be run on the web browser using links as follows,

http://local=
host.archive.org:8080/wayback/
http://localhost:port - Heritrix

The ubuntu=
 server has a public IP as well. But when I try to access them using the pu=
blic IP from another computer, it says "could not connect to the ip". I use=
d following links,

http://publicIP:port

http://publicIP.archive.org:8080/=
wayback/

Please give me a suggestion to this.

Regards
